scriptsz.deploy: npm run build && eb list && eb use udagram-api && eb deploy
scriptsz.deploy:win: npm run build:win && eb list && eb use udagram-api && eb deploy
scriptsz.build: npm install . && npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config || xcopy "./src/config" "./www/config" /I && cp -R .elasticbeanstalk www/.elasticbeanstalk || xcopy "./.elasticbeanstalk" "./www/.elasticbeanstalk" /I && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc ||copy "./.npmrc" "www/" && cp package.json www/package.json || copy "./package.json" "www/" && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . || 7z a -tzip Archive.zip . && cd ../
scriptsz.build:win: npm install . && npm run clean:win && tsc && xcopy "./src/config" "./www/config" /I && xcopy "./.elasticbeanstalk" "./www/.elasticbeanstalk" /I && copy "./.npmrc" "www/" && copy "./package.json" "www/" && cd ./www && 7z a -tzip Archive.zip . && cd ..
